author: bmwlego
title: Great Addition to Layouts and Green Sloped Bricks
review: This tree set is a great supply of green slope bricks. The construction of the set is rather simple but the result is an intricate tree. I bought this set last Christmas and it has been next to my Model Town House since I built this set earlier this year. It looks like a sculpted piece of art and this set exceeded my expectations. I just wish I had more of this set so I could build larger trees and more of the same tree as well. I just checked LEGO.com and they are not listing this set this year. Last year's snowflake is not being offered this year either which is upsetting. Both of these holiday sets are great.

author: Nermal
title: Spruce up your dioramas
review: This tree is cheap, cool, and an excellent addition to any mountain, park or Christmas diorama. I got one last year and it has proved useful on many occasions. If you buy more than one, you can join em  into a super tree. A definite must have.

author: asianlego
title: Nice Tree
review: This tree is actually quite detailed and looks good anywhere in your Lego town! Also it isn't too big, it scales in perfectly with a minifig! A somewhat better and more costlier alternative to the Coniferous Trees.

author: Z_wing
title: so many green bricks!
review:
in fact, out of the 33 pieces in this set, 31 of them are green :)

tree
pros: has lots of green pieces
cons: none

pieces
pros: all green pieces
cons: none

build
pros: strong, quick, easy
cons: none

price
pros: cheap, worth it
cons: none

I recommend this set to anyone who needs green bricks
I hope you found my review helpful
